user_query: Fetch the positions of the Moon and Jupiter for the next 7 days, and provide a list of stars with a minimum distance of 10 light years from Earth and an absolute magnitude brighter than 5.

TaskList.description: Fetch the positions of the Moon for the next 7 days.
Fetch the positions of Jupiter for the next 7 days.
Retrieve a list of stars with a minimum distance of 10 light years from Earth, and an absolute magnitude brighter than 5.
